name: Paranormal VHS
storyline:
James is a vlogger of the channel Paranormal VHS, where he spends a night in some horrifying and abandoned locations where terrible events have happened. His equipment is just a VHS camera that allows him to record any paranormal activity.

His next vlog is to spend a night in the Crimson Hill Hospital that were rumours horrifying experiments were made on their patients and due to some recent mysterious events, the building is now abandoned and considered haunted.
summary: Paranormal VHS is a horror game that features a VHS tape-inspired aesthetic. The game's story revolves around a popular vlogger who spends a night in haunted locations in search of paranormal activity.
